summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BizPromptAI business automation platform. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all 13 endpoints working perfectly. Frontend is 95% functional with excellent mobile responsiveness and successful Stripe integration. Minor modal overlay issues identified but don't affect core functionality.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlays occasionally intercept pointer events preventing button clicks
ui_bugs.impact: Affects some user interactions in modal dialogs

passed_tests: All 13 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Lead magnet capture form (desktop and mobile)
Stripe payment integration and checkout redirect
Admin dashboard with user metrics and data
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay pointer event interception issue in authentication and survey modals. Consider adding force=true to click handlers or adjusting z-index/pointer-events CSS properties.
